Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Reviewing the event log table to identify variations in LocalResident status, CommunityGroup affiliations, PreliminaryScore, ScoreAdjustment, and final Decision across cases C001 to C005.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Observing that cases with CommunityGroup Highland Civic Darts Club receive +10 adjustment, while others get 0, and correlating this with LocalResident TRUE in those cases leading to higher adjusted scores.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Inferring approval thresholds from decisions: residents approved at 700 or above (C004), non-residents approved at 740 (C005) but rejected at 715 (C003), suggesting lower threshold for locals.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Explaining bias manifestation: LocalResident and CommunityGroup attributes favor certain groups via adjustments and possible threshold differences, influencing fairness by disadvantaging non-locals or unaffiliated individuals despite similar preliminary scores.

Name: Ethical or Moral Reasoning - PE
Text: Considering implications: Process lacks equity for those without community ties or local status, potentially rejecting creditworthy applicants and perpetuating geographic or social biases.
